response.summary:
Experience in discrete pneumatic systems, proportional technique and high speed applications.
PLC programming by Ladder, structured text and Grafcet in the following brands: Allenbradley (controlLogix family, CompactLogix and SLC), Omron (CJ2 family), Mitsubishi (FX series) and Delta (all series), programming of human- HMI interfaces machine on various brands.
Experience in installation and commissioning of VFD inverters for AC motors and servo systems.
Knowledge and implementation of some industrial communication field buses (DeviceNet, Modbus RTU and Modbus (TCP / IP), Ethernet, CanOpen).

Experience in hotmelt applicator systems for the following industries: (Packaging, Nonwovens, Woodworking, Envelope).
response.skills: Ingeniería, Automatización de procesos, Tecnología Machine Vision, Diseño de sistemas de control, Variadores de frecuencia, Robótica

profile_positions.description: Development of automated systems for packaging machinery, machinery for the manufacture of brushes and brooms, machinery for polyurethane injection
profile_positions.title: Mechatronic Engineer
Technical and sales deparment for hotmelt and coldglue solutions for equipment of ValcoMelton

profile_positions.description:
Automation technician for assembling control systems used automotive industry (GM Motors Colmotores - CCA Mazda).

High speed special applications for pneumatic industry using MAC Valves Inc brand.
profile_positions.title: Technical Department Specialist

school.name: Universidad Nacional de Colombia, Bogotá, Colombia
